name: Chronicles of Gavri
description:
Enter the antediluvian world as the last warrior of a divine order sent to embark on a journey against a tirade of a rising godless nation, to impede and restore righteousness for the glory God!

  • Overwhelm your enemies with a string-able yet simple combo system.
  • Easy keyboard commands with a one button attack format.
  • Progressively intriguing and engaging story-line that is biblical, sound and entertaining.
